txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Marked furs from the beasts in eastern Dunland. Collect them and deliver them to the taskmaster at Forthbrond to earn favour with Théodred's Riders.
'Well, that is a few less beasts stalking after our horses. My thanks to you.'
'There is no shortage of beasts in these wild lands... Keep your eyes open.'
The Rohirrim taskmaster wants marked furs. He can be found in the Rohirrim encampment of Forthbrond in the Isendale.
Deliver the marked furs to the taskmaster at Forthbrond
You have accepted a task to acquire marked furs. You are to deliver them to the Rohirrim taskmaster at Forthbrond.
Wanted: Marked furs from the beasts in eastern Dunland.
